title.rendered: Braces in Allentown: Exeter Smiles Delivers Orthodontic Care at Affordable Prices

content.rendered:
Exeter Smiles makes high-quality braces in Allentown accessible to all, ensuring a comprehensive, cost-effective path to beautiful smiles.

Our commitment at Exeter Smiles extends beyond just delivering excellent orthodontic care.”

— Dr. Joel Silman

ALLENTOWN, PA, USA, April 18, 2024 /EINPresswire.com/ — In its ongoing mission to provide the highest standard of orthodontic care, Exeter Smiles proudly offers its exceptional braces services to the Allentown community. This initiative is part of Exeter Smiles’ dedication to ensuring that effective and affordable braces in Allentown are available to individuals dreaming of a perfect smile.

Dr. Joel Silman, dentist at Exeter Smiles, shares insights on the practice’s patient-first approach, “Our commitment at Exeter Smiles extends beyond just delivering excellent orthodontic care. We aim to make braces in Allentown accessible to everyone by offering an all-inclusive, transparent pricing model. This way, we help our patients achieve their smile goals without financial stress.”

Exeter Smiles sets itself apart by offering traditional braces at an all-inclusive price of only $3,995. This comprehensive package includes x-rays, retainers, adjustments, repairs, and emergency visits, ensuring a smooth and predictable treatment journey with no hidden fees.

In recognition of the diverse needs of its patients, Exeter Smiles also provides Invisalign as an alternative to traditional braces, catering to those seeking a more discreet orthodontic solution. This flexibility in treatment options underscores Exeter Smiles’ dedication to meeting the varied preferences and lifestyles of its patients.

Individuals interested in exploring their options for braces in Allentown are encouraged to take the first step by scheduling a free consultation at https://exeter-smiles.com/allentown-office/.

About Exeter Smiles: For several years, Exeter Smiles has offered teen and adult patients throughout Pennsylvania braces for as low as $3,995, as well as Invisalign treatments. The team of dental professionals remains dedicated to providing high-quality care at an affordable price. Learn more at https://exeter-smiles.com/.

Meredith Souder
Exeter Smiles
+ +1 610-401-0559
email us here

News Provided By

April 18, 2024, 13:44 GMT
